title: Cold Case.S03.E01-11.720p.HDTV_TTL
description:
As far as I can tell this season has never been posted in 720p anywhere in a full season pack. It may have been posted immediately after it aired in single episodes, but I have never found any episodes  prior to season 5 in 720p. When this originally aired a file over 1GB was quite large for most people, thus the 350MB file size was mainly the size of choice.

I added chapters for your viewing convenience.



If you are unfamiliar with the show please read the included text file---Cold Case Series History.





The other seasons will follow.





These are my original rips from CBS and from the rebroadcast on ION.





Grab the sample and check it out.



If you like it then go for it.





Please do not hit and run.



Enjoy and be kind and SHARE!!!!!!
